sentences.sContent: She had big eyes and full lips (= large and round lips ).
sentences.sCn: 她眼睛大大的，嘴唇很丰满。

sentences.sContent: Matt opened the door with a smile on his lips.
sentences.sCn: 马特开了门，嘴角挂着微笑。

sentences.sContent: Marty kissed me right on the lips!
sentences.sCn: 马蒂一下吻在我的嘴唇上！

sentences.sContent: Stephen pursed his lips with distaste (= brought them together tightly into a small circle ).
sentences.sCn: 斯蒂芬厌恶地噘起嘴唇。

sentences.sContent: ...Are employers merely paying lip service to the DDA...

phrases.pCn: 大家都在谈论的，大家都在传的 [亦作 on every lip]
唇封；唇形密封；边缘密封

words.tran: 没有嘴唇的；（器皿等）无嘴的
用嘴唇接触；轻轻说出；溢出；吹奏（lip的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: one of the two soft parts around your mouth where your skin is redder or darker
